comments:
I20040129

Due to bug 50820 I am urged to use the -keyring flag. Downloaded fresh I20040129
and started with:

eclipse.exe -showlocation -nosplash -data %TARGET% -keyring %KEYRING% -vm %SDK%
-vmargs %VMOptions% -verify %*

I also tried to supply -password without success.
